home.title: Asteractive - Construction & Engineering Excellence
home.description: Specializing in construction, contracting, and integrated engineering systems with innovation, precision, and reliability.
home.ogDescription: Delivering turnkey solutions that combine quality, safety, and smart technology.

footer.about: A leading firm in electrical, mechanical, and construction fields, committed to executing projects with quality, safety, and smart technology.

hero.title: Engineering Your Vision Into Reality
hero.subtitle: Your integrated partner for complex engineering: from high-voltage power lines and water treatment plants to advanced fire safety, security, and AV systems.

about.title: We Build and Shape the Future
about.paragraph1: We specialize in construction, contracting, and integrated engineering systems, bringing innovation, precision, and reliability to every project we deliver.
about.paragraph2: With a dedicated team of professionals and a commitment to international standards, Asteractive delivers integrated solutions that combine quality, safety, and smart technology.

services.title: Our Core Services
services.card1_desc: Full-scale civil works, from construction to complex water treatment plants and pump systems.
services.card2_desc: Integrated solutions for power generation (generators), transmission (HV/MV lines), and distribution (transformers, panels).
services.card3_desc: Design and installation of advanced CCTV, fire alarm, and automatic fire suppression systems.
services.card4_desc: Specialized audio solutions for buildings and conferences, including public address and simultaneous translation systems.

benefits.title: Why Choose Us?
benefits.card1_desc: We adhere to the highest quality standards, from design to delivery, to ensure all desired outcomes are achieved.
benefits.card2_desc: We place great importance on applying health and safety standards on all work sites to ensure a safe, accident-free environment.
benefits.card3_desc: We are committed to delivering projects on time without delays, with accurate schedules and constant progress monitoring.
benefits.card4_desc: Our strength lies in our people. We have a specialized team of highly skilled engineers and technicians with continuous training.

cta.title: Let's Build Something Great
cta.subtitle: Have a question or want to discuss a project? Contact us directly or send us a message to get a detailed consultation.
